aathreya srushin saha bharadwaja srushin da manulowin dewlowata gos kaya chikithsa shasthraya igenagena paminiye ya yi kiyana athara , thamama ihathmayehi dewiyekwa sita, thama ma shakrayagen igena gena pamini baw “dhanwanthari” srushinge shreshta shishya sushratha wisin sakaskarana lada “sushratha sanhitha” nam shalya waidya granthaya pawa, pasu kaleka “nagarjuna” nam pandiwaratayak wisin prathisanskaranaya kara thibe yayi dallana aacharyyawaraya prakashakara thibe.

me siyalle prathipalaya: siyawas dekakata pasu sinhala bauddhayinta swakiya nijabima thulama deshapalana balaya nawathath ahimi wimayi. 1810 di ingirisi sannaddha balamulu antha parajayakata path kara udaratin palawa hariyath, 1815 di sammuthiyaka namayen mulu ratama yatath kara ganimata doyilige katakatha saha kumanthrana hamudawa samath wiya. 2010 di laksha 18 chanda paratharayakin lajja sahagatha lesa parajaya kara damu robato blek ge sudukodi hamudawa kisi kalabalayak nathiwa 2015 di rata athpath kara ganne katakatha saha kumanthrana magini.
